channel.title: Adding 999m gold spawnpoint?
channel.description:
I need a autospawn or whatever to span 999m gold on my staff island. Like the gold is on the ground when people arrive. Also what are the item numbers for skill capes becuase I can't seem to find a LIST of them.
When I tried doing itemspawnpoints.java it gives me
[code]itemspawnpoints.java:22: integer number too large: 0995 ItemHandler.addItem(3659, 3497, 0995, 1000000, ItemHandler.globalItemController[ i], false); // Rune Pickaxe ^ itemspawnpoints.java:23: integer number too large: 0995 ItemHandler.addItem(3658, 3597, 0995, 1000000, ItemHandler.globalItemController[ i], false); // Rune Pickaxe ^ 2 errors
Choob Isle Has Been Compiled SuccesFully!
Press any key to continue . . . /code]
when im trying to spawn 999m[/code]

item.title: Adding 999m gold spawnpoint?
item.dc:creator: @nacnac nacnac
item.description:
@nacnac wrote:

try taking away the 0 and make it 995

Read full topic
